ProjectTitle: Political Theology in Contemporary Orthodox Christianity: A Critical and Constructive Eschatological Engagement
InitialFeedbackHistory:
27/01/2025
The questions in your DMP are missing, when downloading your DMP from DMP online please check both the the boxes "question text and section headings" and "unanswered questions"
Data: will you also generate data, e.g. code, research notes or annotations? 
Documentation/metadata: please describe here how you will document data, storage is part of the next question, will you use tools such as Zotero or NVivo, add readme files... ? for more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata
Storage: SSDs are not very save and secure and the ICTS recommends against the use or OneDrive for research data, you can find solutions recommended by the ICTS in the storage guide: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
Preservation: Please note that RDR a data repository where you can share your data with other researchers, you can't store your articles or thesis in closed acces here; please consult the storage guide to find suitable solutions to preserve your data after the project.
label: good with suggestions
